typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{'No'} as short,
		{ 'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Presence or absence of inspection record'} as string,
		{ 'Inspection date'} as date,
		{ 'Total cholesterol'} as string,
		{ 'LDL cholesterol'} as string,
		{ 'HDL cholesterol'} as string,
		{ 'Urea nitrogen'} as string,
		{ 'Creatinine'} as short,
		{ 'Uric acid'} as string,
		{ 'Urine protein'} as string,
		{ 'Blood sugar'} as short,
		{ 'Diabetes diagnosis age'} as string,
		{ 'HbA1c'} as string,
		{ 'AST'} as string,
		{ 'ALT'} as string,
		{ 'LDH'} as string,
		{ 'Retinopathy'} as string,
		{ 'Hypertension diagnosis age sodium'} as string,
		{ 'Na'} as string,
		{ 'K'} as string,
		{ 'ECG abnormalities'} as string,
		{ 'Triglyceride'} as string,
		{ 'Diagnosis age of dyslipidemia'} as string,
		{ 'History of coronary artery disease'} as string,
		{ 'Chronic kidney disease diagnosis age'} as string,
		{ 'Total protein'} as string,
		{ 'Albumin'} as string,
		{ 'Hematuria'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ir04
source(output(
		device as string,
		{ serialNo} as string,
		{ Battery Level} as string,
		{ Measure Date Time} as string,
		{ Body Fat Percentage} as string,
		{ Basal Metabolism} as string,
		{ Skeletal Muscle Percentage} as string,
		{ Weight} as string,
		{ BMI} as string,
		{ Visceral Fat Level} as string,
		{ Body Age} as string,
		SubjectID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> weight
ir04 select(mapColumn(
		{ 'SubjectID'},
		{ 'Inspection date'},
		{ 'Total cholesterol'},
		{ 'LDL cholesterol'},
		{ 'HDL cholesterol'},
		{ 'HbA1c'},
		{ 'AST'},
		{ 'ALT'},
		{ 'LDH'},
		{ 'Na'},
		{ 'K'},
		{ 'ECG abnormalities'},
		{ 'History of coronary artery disease'}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
weight select(mapColumn(
		{ Measure Date Time},
		{ Body Fat Percentage},
		{ Basal Metabolism},
		SubjectID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, Select1 join(SubjectID == { 'SubjectID'},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{ Measure Date Time},
		{ Body Fat Percentage},
		{ Basal Metabolism},
		SubjectID,
		{ 'Inspection date'},
		{ 'Total cholesterol'},
		{ 'LDL cholesterol'},
		{ 'HDL cholesterol'},
		{ 'HbA1c'},
		{ 'AST'},
		{ 'ALT'},
		{ 'LDH'},
		{ 'Na'},
		{ 'K'},
		{ 'ECG abnormalities'},
		{ 'History of coronary artery disease'}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 select(mapColumn(
		{ Measure Date Time}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select3 sink(input(
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'} as string,
		{ 'I am actively going out'} as string,
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'} as string,
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'} as string,
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'} as string,
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise function'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> internalHealthInfo
Select4 sink(input(
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'} as string,
		{ 'I am actively going out'} as string,
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'} as string,
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'} as string,
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'} as string,
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise function'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> timeInfo
